metadata.disclaimer: Based on publicly available crosswalks and expert analysis. Validate with qualified assessors for compliance/audit use.

clauses.title: Prevent Unencrypted Requests
clauses.rationale: SC-08 transmission confidentiality/integrity; SC-08(1) cryptographic protection; SC-13 cryptographic protection.
clauses.gaps: Minimal gap. SP 800-53 encryption-in-transit controls align well.

clauses.title: Ensure Data Encryption at Rest Utilizes Customer Managed Encryption Keys
clauses.rationale: SC-28 protection at rest; SC-12 key management.
clauses.gaps: FINOS CCC specifically requires customer-managed keys (CMEK/BYOK). SP 800-53 covers encryption and key management but customer key control in cloud is not explicitly addressed.

clauses.title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) for Access
clauses.rationale: IA-02 MFA enhancements comprehensively cover multi-factor authentication.

clauses.title: Log All Access and Changes
clauses.rationale: AU-02 auditable events; AU-03 content; AU-06 review; AU-12 generation. Comprehensive logging.
clauses.gaps: Minor: FINOS CCC is cloud-specific (API calls, console access). SP 800-53 AU family covers generally.

clauses.title: Prevent Access from Untrusted Entities
clauses.rationale: AC-03 access enforcement; AC-04 information flow; SC-07 boundary protection; AC-17 remote access.
clauses.gaps: Minor: FINOS CCC specifically addresses cloud tenant isolation and untrusted entity prevention in multi-cloud context.

clauses.title: Ensure Resource Inventory
clauses.rationale: CM-08 component inventory with automated discovery; PM-05 system inventory.
clauses.gaps: Minor: FINOS CCC specifically addresses cloud resource inventory across cloud service providers. SP 800-53 covers inventory generally.

clauses.title: Implement Change Management Procedures
clauses.rationale: CM-03 change control; CM-04 impact analysis; CM-05 access restrictions; CM-09 configuration management plan.

clauses.title: Enable Security Monitoring and Alerting
clauses.rationale: SI-04 system monitoring; AU-06 audit review; CA-07 continuous monitoring; SI-04(5) system alerts.

clauses.title: Implement Network Segmentation
clauses.rationale: SC-07 boundary protection; SC-32 system partitioning; AC-04 information flow.
clauses.gaps: Minimal gap. SP 800-53 network segmentation controls are comprehensive.

clauses.title: Implement Vulnerability Management
clauses.rationale: RA-05 vulnerability management; SI-02 flaw remediation; SI-05 security alerts.

clauses.title: Implement Identity and Access Management (IAM)
clauses.rationale: AC/IA families comprehensive for IAM. AC-02 account management; AC-03 enforcement; AC-06 least privilege; IA-02 authentication.
clauses.gaps: Minor: FINOS CCC is cloud-IAM specific (roles, policies, service accounts). SP 800-53 covers IAM generally.

clauses.title: Enforce Least Privilege Access
clauses.rationale: AC-06 with comprehensive enhancements for least privilege enforcement.

clauses.title: Implement Backup and Recovery
clauses.rationale: CP-09 system backup; CP-06 alternate storage; CP-10 recovery.

clauses.title: Maintain Secure Configuration Baselines
clauses.rationale: CM-02 baseline configuration; CM-06 configuration settings; CM-07 least functionality.

clauses.title: Implement Incident Response Procedures
clauses.rationale: IR family comprehensive for incident response.

clauses.title: Ensure Data Classification and Handling
clauses.rationale: RA-02 categorization; MP family media handling; AC-16 security attributes.
clauses.gaps: Minor: FINOS CCC addresses cloud data classification. SP 800-53 covers through categorization and media handling.

clauses.title: Enable Audit Logging for Cloud Services
clauses.rationale: AU family comprehensive; AU-16 covers cross-organizational audit logging.
clauses.gaps: Minor: FINOS CCC specifically addresses cloud service audit logs (CloudTrail, Activity Log equivalents).
